name: Welcome to Control (GMTK 2020)
description:
You need to collect 6 gears to repair your Generator at Control, your base of operation. Until you do, your base is running on batteries, and it won't last forever!

Until your generator is repaired, keep your base running by depositing batteries at the base.

You control your hovercraft by walking up to each thruster and activating it. But each thruster is also battery powered! If a thruster runs out of battery, it won't work until you replace the battery.
